setup.title: Server setup wizard
setup.subtitle: Complete initial server configuration to start using the app. We detected that the server is not initialized yet.
setup.intro: Answer a few questions to tailor security and defaults. You can change these later in settings.

multiuser.title: Are you planning to use:
multiuser.subtitle: This affects space saving and some security settings.
multiuser.linkAria: Open documentation in a new tab

descriptions.family: We will optimize for home/family usage.
descriptions.many: We will tighten certain checks for broader sharing.
descriptions.unknown: You can change this later in settings.

usage.title: You plan to use the cloud for:
usage.subtitle: Select one or more options

storage.title: Where do you want to store your data?
storage.subtitle: Choose storage location for your files.

descriptions.local: Store files on the server's local filesystem
descriptions.s3: Store files in remote S3-compatible object storage

telemetry.title: Allow sending statistics?
telemetry.subtitle: This information helps us improve products and does not reveal your identity.
